author: jukka
msg: TIKA-471: Avoid Charset name bottleneck when multiple threads are using HtmlParser
Avoid duplicate charset lookup in CharsetUtils.clean/forName.
Use static charset constants in the RTF parser.

author: jukka
msg: TIKA-471: Avoid Charset name bottleneck when multiple threads are using HtmlParser
Pre-load all charset constants used by juniversalchardet
Also improve heuristics for detecting the difference between ISO-8859-1 and WINDOWS-1252; use the latter only when CR characters are present.
